Edit Teacher

First name @if (proForm.get('first')?.hasError('required')) { First name is required }
Last name
Gender Male Female Other @if (proForm.get('gender')?.hasError('required')) { Gender is required }
Mobile
Password @if (proForm.get('password')?.hasError('required')) { password is required }

Designation
Select Department Mechanical Science Mathematics Computer Civil @if (proForm.get('department')?.hasError('required')) { Select Any Department }
Address
Email @if (proForm.get('email')?.hasError('email') && proForm.get('email')?.touched) { Please enter a valid email address }
Date Of Birth @if (proForm.get('dob')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
